short.ar: إجابات من ChatGPT وStackOverflow وويكيبيديا وما إلى ذلك جنبًا إلى جنب مع نتائج Google.
short.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Answers from ChatGPT, StackOverflow, Wikipedia, etc. next to Google results.
short.de: Antworten von ChatGPT, StackOverflow, Wikipedia usw. neben Google-Ergebnissen.
short.es: Respuestas de ChatGPT, StackOverflow, Wikipedia, etc. junto a los resultados de Google.
short.fr: Réponses de ChatGPT, StackOverflow, Wikipédia, etc. à côté des résultats Google.
short.hi: ChatGPT, StackOverflow, विकिपीडिया आदि से उत्तर Google परिणामों के बगल में.
short.it: Risposte da ChatGPT, StackOverflow, Wikipedia, ecc. accanto ai risultati di Google.
short.ja: ChatGPT、StackOverflow、Wikipedia などからの回答を Google の検索結果の横に表示します。
short.ko: ChatGPT, StackOverflow, Wikipedia 등에서 Google 검색 결과 옆에 답변을 제공합니다.
short.nl: Antwoorden van ChatGPT, StackOverflow, Wikipedia enz. naast Google-resultaten.
short.ru: Ответы от ChatGPT, StackOverflow, Wikipedia и т. Д. Рядом с результатами Google.
short.zh_CN: 来自 ChatGPT、StackOverflow、Wikipedia 等的答案与 Google 搜索结果并排.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
OptiSearch is a powerful Chrome extension that revolutionizes your web search experience. It seamlessly integrates with your favorite search engines and enhances your search results with useful content retrieved from popular websites and forums such as the StackExchange sites or Wikipedia.

With OptiSearch, you can find answers to your questions faster and more easily. The extension parses relevant and high-quality information from various sources and displays it alongside your search results, giving you a comprehensive view of the topic you're interested in.

OptiSearch also includes advanced features such as graph plotting and math expression evaluation. It's a reliable and efficient tool that helps you find what you're looking for faster, and makes your search journey more enjoyable and rewarding.

Download OptiSearch now and discover a new way of searching the web that's smarter, faster, and more fun!
